title: About Me
text:
Professional Background
I bring cross-functional experience across data analytics, digital marketing, financial modeling, and international project development, having worked in both Vietnam and the U.S.
Previously, I supported analytics at Marriott Bonvoy, directed digital marketing at Tin A Co., Ltd, and coordinated EV infrastructure and investor engagement at Thang Uy Group. I am currently a Teaching Assistant for Python & SQL course at Boston University.

title: About Me
text:
